"Guiden": "You are aware of the concept of Power Level, yes?"
"It is an indication of an ARKS' battle capabilities, calculated by their Mags."
"The value takes your own strength into account, as well as that of your weapons and armor."
"Which means you must be vigilant in maintaining your gear as well."
"Special Abilities can improve your Power Level too, of course."
"If you have yet to make fine adjustments to your weaponry while upgrading them, now is the best time to learn."
"First, head to the item lab and try the Special Ability Capsule exchange process."
"Ah yes, you will need these as well."
"Received 10 C/Stamina II, 10 C/Spirita II, 10 C/Power II, and 10 C/Shoot II."
"Received 10 C/Techni II, 50 Photon Quartz, and 50 Trinite."
"Received 10 C/Stamina II, 10 Photon Quartz, and 10 Trinite."
"You may decide which capsules to make use of. Give it a try."
